channel.description: Recent content in Policy on Serhat Giydiren

item.title: AI Safety Diary: October 2, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on the 8th chapter of the AI Safety Book, providing a deep dive into the challenges and potential solutions in AI governance, from corporate self-regulation to international treaties.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 25, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on the 4th chapter of the AI Safety Atlas, focusing on the critical area of AI governance and the challenges of creating effective policies and institutions to manage AI development globally.
